name: osmotic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
connected with the process in plants and animals by which a liquid moves gradually from one part of the body or the plant to another through a membrane (= cell covering): an osmotic process Osmotic pressure is important in many biological processes. See
osmosis
More examplesFewer examplesThe swelling of the capsule is due to osmotic intake of water.These processes help maintain osmotic balance in the body.Circulation of the distilled water encourages osmotic exchange of the salts over a period of several days.
